# Changelog

## 1.1.1 (2025-10-02)
* Update dependencies ([MGNLCLI-436](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-436))

## 1.1.0 (2025-04-01)
* Create i18n keys when creating content app ([MGNLCLI-359](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-359))
* Ensure datasource is defined for the content type ([MGNLCLI-360](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-360))

## 1.0.3 (2025-03-17)
* Update content type and app prototype ([MGNLCLI-357](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-357))
* Address deprecated packages ([MGNLCLI-320](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-320))

## 1.0.2 (2025-01-28)
* Configure ESLint and prettier ([MGNLCLI-258](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-258))
* Add depcheck to husky ([MGNLCLI-289](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-289))
* Remove default description of title coming from mtk's i18n ([MGNLCLI-319](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-319))

## 1.0.1 (2025-01-07)
* refactor content-helper to use class-based approach ([MGNLCLI-316](https://magnolia-cms.atlassian.net/browse/MGNLCLI-316))

## 1.0.0 (2024-10-14)
* introduce `@magnolia/cli-content-helper` package
